text: Wonderful Junior College providing a holistic education. Tremendously benefitted from my experience here at ACJC in 2003-2004, with lifelong friendships and bonds still going strong 20+ years later. Blessed to be part of the ACSian family, with teachers and even our former Principal being ever supportive of our individual endeavours. The sports facilities were fantastic too from the track to the swimming pool and gym, I credit a lot of my sporting journey from this too. Thank you, ACJC! 🙏🏻
Teachers’ performance ought to be evaluated by students. This is so that the MOE or the school can have an extra data point to assess the quality of the lessons by the teachers.
This school takes our money 💰 and makes us pay for our school notes 📝. Poor quality and unhygienic food dispose area, Im pretty sure the plates are not cleaned properly. 😔
I think that acjc students are cool and amazing in terms of their participation in many activities and most of them are academically successful

Blasphemous place to study at 🤮 School is too big🙄 Time table is AI generated🤖 Trash lecture system where ALL of them are online 🚮. Toilet signs are misspelled 🤦‍♂️. Teachers assume students know everything so they rush through content 😡. Some students are really weird, creepy and annoying 🤡 CCA no variety and too much commitment 💤  School demands so much money from students but facilities are horrid 💸 Library is really ugly and access to the 2nd floor is restricted half the time 🧐Tables in lecture theatres are broken and too small👨‍🔧 Too many activities going on at once, eats into curriculum time  😫 fix the school.
